item.title: Introduction to Principal Component Analysis
item.description: Introduction As you might be well aware of Big Data isn’t going anywhere anytime soon. Big Data Analytics, an active research area which is concerned with analyzing large scale, fast paced and varying types of data will stay a challenging field. You might ask yourself - how this is linked to Principal Component Analysis? This statistical analysis is able to deal with one characteristic trait of Big Data. As you may recall Big Data is primarly characterized by four Vs (Volume, Variety, Velocity, Veracity).
